instruction: How was the performance of the random forest algorithm evaluated in estimating the chlorophyll-a concentration in inland water using the proposed band ratio algorithm and machine learning approach?

instruction: Can the band ratio algorithm using remote sensing technology and a machine learning approach be considered superior to traditional methods for estimating the chlorophyll-a concentration in inland water, based on the findings of the related study?
